rules_text:
Revered [i](This creature shares its following abilities with other creatures you control that have counters on them.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to any target.
rules_text2: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on it. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later.)[/i]
